The field mask used to indicate which fields in the resource are to be updated.

paths.description: The set of field mask paths.

protobufFieldMask.description:
"paths": ["f.a", "f.b.d"]

Here `f` represents a field in some root message, `a` and `b` fields in the message found in `f`, and `d` a field found in the message in `f.b`.

Fields are represented by their JSON field names.

   "paths": ["f.field1", "f.field_on_f.some_field_name"]

Field masks are used to specify a subset of fields that should be, or have been, modified by an update operation.

Field masks are JSON encoding as a string array.
protobufFieldMask.title: FieldMask represents a set of symbolic field paths, for example:
